item.title: About
item.description:
I’m Gavin Rouse — a software test engineer, political operative, and systems builder based in Pasco, Washington.

Experience

Software Test Engineer I

Cadwell Laboratories, Inc. — July 2017 - Present

Developing and testing electroencephalogram (EEG) software used by medical professionals worldwide to treat brain disorders, particularly epilepsy.

  • Lead testing for major, minor, and limited software releases
  • Design, document, execute, and maintain test plans and test cases
  • Build and manage test automation frameworks (C#, Visual Studio, Azure DevOps)
  • Two awards for exhibiting Cadwell’s core values
  • Mentor and onboard interns

Technologies: C#, Microsoft Visual Studio, Microsoft Test Manager, Team Foundation Server, Azure DevOps, Git

item.title: Now
item.description:
What I’m focused on right now. (Last updated: February 14, 2026)

Currently Building

  • Treasurer automation for Franklin County GOP — designing database schema and webhook integrations
  • Personal website — launching gavinrouse.com as central hub
  • AI employee systems — refining how I work with AI agents across all projects

Currently Learning

  • Washington PDC compliance requirements
  • GiveButter API and webhook architecture
  • Hugo static site generation
  • Event planning at scale with limited resources

Currently Reading

[Add books, articles, papers you’re reading]

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Active projects and experiments. Always building.

Professional Work

EEG Software Testing Platform

Cadwell Laboratories | Production System

Comprehensive test automation and quality assurance for neurodiagnostic software used in hospitals worldwide.

  • Impact: Software monitors electrical brain activity for epilepsy diagnosis and treatment
  • Scale: Used by medical professionals across 50+ countries
  • Challenge: Ensuring FDA compliance and patient safety in regulated medical device environment
  • Result: Zero critical defects in production releases under my test leadership

Stack: C#, Visual Studio, Azure DevOps, TFS, Microsoft Test Manager
Role: Test Lead, Automation Engineer
